verses.name: Genesis 38:10
verses.text: And the thing which he did displeased the Lord: wherefore he slew him also.

verses.name: Genesis 38:11
verses.text: Then said Judah to Tamar his daughter in law, Remain a widow at thy father’s house, till Shelah my son be grown: for he said, Lest peradventure he die also, as his brethren did. And Tamar went and dwelt in her father’s house.

verses.name: Genesis 38:12
verses.text: And in process of time the daughter of Shuah Judah’s wife died; and Judah was comforted, and went up unto his sheepshearers to Timnath, he and his friend Hirah the Adullamite.
